items.title: Dr. Pang Sze Dai
items.subtitle: CTO/Inventor
items.text: Associate Professor at NUS in Civil and Environmental Engineering, Dr. Pang is a leading expert in materials science with over x years of experience. He brings deep expertise in sustainable building technologies and protective systems, having led numerous high-impact research projects that drive innovation at Circrete.

items.title: Dr. Tong Shanshan

items.text: Dr. Tong has x years of experience specializing in urban built environments and energy-efficient building designs. Her work focuses on building envelope performance, microclimate monitoring, and passive building design, ensuring Circreteâ€™s solutions foster sustainable and comfortable living spaces.

items.title: Dr. Du Hongjian
items.subtitle: Technical Advisor/Inventor
items.text: With over x years of experience, Dr. Du is a pioneer in low-carbon building materials and 3D concrete printing. His award-winning research focuses on reducing carbon emissions and upcycling waste, positioning Circrete as a leader in sustainable cement innovation.
